tr.td: Merchant Marine wins the opening coin and defers to the second half
WPI will receive the opening kickoff and defend the north goal
E. Swayne kickoff 42 yards to the WPI23, Paul DePlacido return 7 yards to the WPI30 (P. Keyes).
Zach Grasis rush for 17 yards to the WPI47 (J. Hill).
Dan Eckler pass complete to Anthony Andre for 11 yards to the USMMA42 (C. Kilroy).
